entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry recognized Rowena Ravenclaw from the bust he had seen at Luna’s house.

entities.name: rowena ravenclaw
entities.description: The statue stood beside a door that led, he guessed, to dormitories above. He strode right up to the marble woman, and she seemed to look back at him with a quizzical half smile on her face, beautiful yet slightly intimidating.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Harry recognized Rowena Ravenclaw from the bust he had seen at Luna’s house.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: It was not unlike the tiara Fleur had worn at her wedding.

entities.name: alecto carrow
entities.description: The sloping-shouldered figure of Alecto Carrow was standing before him,
